alert.note: Alert for Emanuel; Johnson; Montgomery; Toombs; Treutlen; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 4:42PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Emanuel, northwestern Toombs, Treutlen, south central Johnson, northeastern Wheeler and Montgomery Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 441 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Adrian to Tarrytown to Glenwood, and moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Swainsboro, Soperton, Mount Vernon, Vidalia, Glenwood, Adrian, Oak Park, Ailey, Higgston, Nunez, Tarrytown, Covena, Landsburg, Norristown, Kibbee, Norristown Junction, Blackville, Zaidee, Gillis Springs and Normantown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.

area.areaDesc: Emanuel; Johnson; Montgomery; Toombs; Treutlen; Wheeler
